Topic.Title: HTML Game Export Version for Apps

Posts.EditableText: Is there any way of dissembling/copying over/reconfiguring/renaming a finished game contained in the Output/.quest folder after selecting View/HTML Developer tools in such a way that it is reformed as, for example, an index.html file that references its associated .js scripts, etc, so that the game can then be converted by third party software such as PhoneGap to a mobile app that can run on Apple and/or Android smartphones and tablets? Many thanks in advance for any thoughts.
